TopicTitle: Docking of two spacecraft launched from the airplane!

Articles.Content:
This is my first challenge, which is to simply launch two ships of an airplane (not both at the same time), making their orbits and dock them.

NOTE: WITHOUT THE USE OF NO CHEAT! (INCLUDING MECHJEB And HYPEREDIT!)
Removed some posts. People, if you don't like a challenge, just skip it. There's no need to be insulting about it.
